message.entry: 'Profile' must be a string scalar or character vector.
Parallel Computing Toolbox license is required for batchsim.
batchsim을 사용하려면 Parallel Computing Toolbox가 설치되어 있어야 합니다.
Parameter ''{0}'' was also specified with 'BatchOptions'. Please specify the parameter only once.
Invalid job. Job must be created with the 'batchsim' command.
An error occurred fetching outputs from the job.
'Profile' and cluster object cannot be specified together.
Cluster object must be the first argument.
